Louisville_Jefferson_County.KMAC Museum:
KMAC Museum is an American art museum where Art is the Big Idea and Craft is the Process. The museum connects people to Art and Creative Practice. The museum is a 501c3 organization located in the West Main District of downtown Louisville, Kentucky


== History ==
The​ ​museum​ ​was​ ​founded​ ​in​ ​1981​ ​as​ ​the​ ​Kentucky​ ​Art​ ​and​ ​Craft​ ​Foundation​ ​to​ ​build​ ​interest​ ​in​ ​the state’s​ ​rich​ ​craft​ ​heritage​ ​which​ ​quickly​ ​led​ ​to​ ​a one of a kind ​collection​ ​of​ ​American​ ​Folk​ ​Art​ ​from​ ​the​ ​region.
